text: Kɨ ua ian azai, Israelba asaghporiaghrɨgha, egh me iregh mamaghɨra ikɨ, egh ua daruan kogham, o? Bar puvatɨ! Guizbangɨra, men arazir kuraba bangɨn Godɨn akurvazim Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazibar ize. God kamaghɨn ifonge, Israelba na bagh ua izam, kamaghɨn kɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazibar akurvagham, eghtɨ me men ganɨghɨva naviba ikuvigh egh ua na bagh izam.
